Along with the pain of his loss, he realizes that only he can find the truth of what happened that night.
His journey in search of the truth reveals his complex identity for the first time: a spy who worked for the security services, an Arab who converted and became a practicing Jew, a man who felt pride, respect and sympathy for a country that has absurdly and horrifyingly betrayed him.

- Title: Mama  (2013) ) 
- Plot: Ever since surviving a domestic violence attack, Kim Addison has found the courage to take matters into her own hands. After learning MMA training in order to learn self-defense, Kim found the confidence to become a trainer herself. She has since set out to help others who have been victims of bullying and abuse just like her. Kim' s personal mission is to empower, inspire and train women and children so they too can stand up for themselves against bullying. Among her students is 13- year- old Logan Chauvin.
Logan was terrorized daily in school by callous bullies. He has been training vigorously with Kim to overcome his experience and is now getting ready for his first real MMA fight.
Although Kim has done everything in her power to train Logan to stand up to bullies at school, there is very little she can do to protect him from his first real MMA opponent.
